thread.section_title: Hudson Reed USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hudson Reed USA | usa.hudsonreed.com
thread.title: Alexander Rubin
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by Alexander Rubin

author: Alexander Rubin
title: Alexander Rubin
text: Great looking product for European homes. Not to friendly for installing in USA. Missing essential instruction, no templates for installation. Some connection are not for USA plumbing. If you have good plumber - then it is not problem, otherwise may get very frustrating with installation. Overroll great looking product, with seem be good quality. I just installed towel warmer and shower system. So far no problem.
